divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my house and looking to the west out my window. Just checking if it had come back and it had it is very bright in the night sky. I thought it was the ufo that has been in our area for 6 days. the obect looked disk shaped and it was moving side to side and up and down but not like a normal helocopter. It moved fast and and slow and was sending out balls of light that flashed around the object at a distance. I knew the ufo was back, I thought it might after the weather cleared and it would not have to be under the cloud deck. The object had disapeared when I last looked for it after 20. I went to get some coffe and when I returned the object was gone.
Summary: A disk object that was moving radomly in sky.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Powell
There were no other sightings in Powell on or around October 7th 2011
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
